passive.description:
(PASSIVE) RUNIC BLADE
                                Abilities charge Riven's blade up to 3 times.Attacks expend charges to deal 21 physical damage (30% + 2% ).Bonus damage to structures is reduced to 50%.Bonus damage to monsters is reduced to 50%.

q.name: (Q) BROKEN WINGS
q.description:
(Q) BROKEN WINGS
 12s  
                                
                                
                                Slash in a direction up to 3 times. Each slash deals 64 physical damage (30/55/80/105 + 55/60/65/70% ) to nearby enemies.The third slash crosses terrain and knocks up nearby enemies for 0.5 seconds.Tap-casting prioritizes champions and large monsters within slash range.Damage to monsters 70%.

 8.5/8/7.5/7s
